name: Boarded Up
description:
Boarded Up is a horror game still under development, therefore a lot of the team's ideas has yet to be implemented.

Current Gameplay:
The player is locked inside a boarded up mansion and needs to get the power back on, in order to get out. Whilst the player is searching the mansion to complete the required tasks to turn on the power, an unknown entity is roaming around the mansion trying to find the player.
